meta_title: Lead Time Definition in MRO: The 2026 Operational Guide
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor lead time calculation. Master the formula for MRO inventory, reduce supply chain latency, and see how Factory AI
title: Lead Time Definition: The Operational Framework for MRO and Manufacturing in 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Lead Time Definition: The Operational Framework for MRO and Manufacturing in 2026

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern but active "brownfield" manufacturing plant. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance engineers (men and women, wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests) are gathered around a large industrial pump. One engineer is pointing to a specific component on the pump, while another holds a tablet (showing only the back of the device) as if checking data. In the background, blurred slightly, are conveyor belts and heavy machinery in motion, conveying a sense of productivity. The lighting is industrial but warm, highlighting the clean PPE and the professionalism of the team. No text or overlays in the image.
